Name: Call of Otechestvo Donbass
About the game: Immerse yourself in a new shooter telling about a protracted conflict in the Donbas. The situation is played up on both sides of the front, typical of this - the head of the militia, who will fight the enemy's air flotilla, as well as ignite in the streets and factories of Yuzovka and the usual one, a recruit of Ukraine, who will have to alone restrain the hordes of militiamen and then pursue the head itself. The ending of this will show you the whole essence of this conflict .. Features - Gaze on both sides of the barricades. - Perhaps one of the first shooters on this topic. - Modern setting in an old school manner. - Game process according to the canons of the classics. - A lot of exploding cars. - And a little more exploding cars. - Modern arsenal. - Streets and factories Yuzovka.
